mapper.insert:
insert into p2p_transfer_dtl ( transfer_id, invest_claim_id, invest_id, lending_id, borrow_id, customer_id, customer_name, buy_amt, hold_share, borrow_product_id, borrow_product_name, borrow_year_rate, create_time, update_time, creator, reviser, logic_state, biz_state ) values
( #{item.transferId}, #{item.investClaimId}, #{item.investId}, #{item.lendingId}, #{item.borrowId}, #{item.customerId}, #{item.customerName}, #{item.buyAmt}, #{item.holdShare}, #{item.borrowProductId}, #{item.borrowProductName}, #{item.borrowYearRate}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.creator}, #{item.reviser}, #{item.logicState}, #{item.bizState} )
